paragraphs: The park "Riegrovy sady" in the center of Prague will immerse itself in the beer Munich traditions and atmosphere of the famous Oktoberfest for ten days. From September 12 to 21, the Oktoberfest festival will take place there. Entrance will be free.
Guests will be able to try four types of draft Bavarian beer: Paulaner, Hofbräu, Hacker-Pschorr, Weihenstephaner Hefe, which will be served in traditional one-liter mugs (steins).
Food options will include fried sausages, sauerkraut, pretzels, and other German dishes.
The festival grounds will be decorated in the theme of "Oktoberfest". Artists in traditional Bavarian costumes will entertain visitors with a repertoire of songs, music, and dances from the stage.
🕑 When: from September 12 to September 21, 2025, from 14:00 to 22:00;
📍 Where: Park Riegrovy sady, Prague-2 (view on map);
ℹ️ You can find the program of musical performances here.
